about_the_game:
• Command powerful aerial units known as Vaahans, and lead your squadron of airborne warriors to victory with innovative macro-based controls.

  • Command and manage a wide variety of unique Vaahans, each with distinct abilities and tactics, to outsmart relentless enemy factions.

  • Turn the tide of battle by strategically altering the attack, defense, and speed of your units and even your opponents. With fully simulated physics, every unit and object react dynamically. Manipulate enemy mass and speed to outmaneuver and overpower them.

  • The enemy is relentless. Gather every resource you can and extract before it's too late.

  • Outsmart your foes through in-depth research and analysis. Encounter a vast array of enemies, each with unique traits to study. Challenge powerful bosses at any time; but victory demands matching their firepower.

  • Discover the Gorger system: a revolutionary RPG elemental interaction mechanic where a unit's composition defines its resistances and vulnerabilities. Study your opponents' physical traits, analyze their constitution, and exploit their weaknesses to gain the upper hand.

  • Unleash powerful 'Leader Moves' from beyond the battlefield, devastating enemies before they even realize what hit them.

  • Gather critical resources by defeating enemies. Collect weapon amulets to craft new Vaahans and Leader moves, upgrade Gorger totems in order to increase offensive potential.

  • Harness the immense power of Chakras to amplify your strategy and enhance the tactical abilities of your Vaahans.

  • Protect the sanctified civilization from unyielding enemy factions by commanding grand flying machines, known as Vimaans. Use them to seize control over vast, diverse mega-continental landmasses.

  • Expand and upgrade the home base; a majestic floating city of divine beings entrusted with the protection of creation itself.

  • Uncover ancient mysteries by gathering knowledge, piecing together artifacts, building instruments, and performing sacred rituals. Ultimately, unlock the secrets of the enigmatic Adhvan Chakra.

short_description: Command divine aerial forces in a real-time tactical combat experience set in a dharmic fantasy world. Strategize, adapt, and upgrade to defend vast territories from devastating invasions. Uncover ancient artifacts, perform sacred rituals, and unravel the mystery of the Adhvan Chakra.
